name: BIG4 Renmark Riverfront Holiday Park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the BIG4 in Renmark in July this year with friends. That time we had a riverfront cabin and we thoroughly enjoyed our brief, one night stay. This time we were wending our way down to MacLarenvale for a festival and had a couple of nights up our sleeves. We couldn't get a riverfront cabin this time but did secure a poolside cabin. I really like this place. I feel safe and secure, the people are friendly, the staff are more than helpful and above all, it's beautifully clean! We will be back. It's not only in a great spot but the town itself is so lovely and friendly. If you have the choice and are not a 'pool' person,go the river front. You get to sit on the balcony and watch the gorgeous sunsets and sunrises (if you're up of course) and the pelicans and ducks will keep you company. Thanks for a wonderful stay.
reviews.title: Great spot, beautiful sunsets/sunrises over the river.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You can't do much better for location. On the banks of the mighty Murray River, close to shopping and attractions. The Park is well presented and the staff friendly and helpful. We have stayed here with family but this last time with another couple
reviews.title: Fabulous Spot

reviews.text: We stayed at big 4 Renmark for 8 days. While the place is beautiful and the position and town are lovely, we had 3 nights of noisy parties, going from 2.00 am to 4.30am.
reviews.title: Lovely park, excellent facilities

reviews.text: We had an ensuite site and they are a great size but situated very close to the highway and so very noisy with trucks finishing very late and starting very early. Ask for a site by the river which is quieter.
reviews.title: Beautiful spot

reviews.text: We stayed here during school holidays with friends and had a fabulous time. Park is well set out and the cabin accommodation superb. A little pricey but well worth it. We had a mixup when trying to extend our holiday by a night (were told we could but they were looking at the wrong cabin). When we discovered the mistake the staff were amazingly accommodating and moved us to another cabin for next to nothing and apologised like crazy. Very well handled! Can't wait to go back and see the new waterpark
reviews.title: Super awesome family holiday

description: Located in Renmark, our caravan and holiday park is set on 22 acres of beautifully landscaped grounds only a short walk to the town centre. An easy 2.5 hour drives from Adelaide and 1.5 hour drive from Mildura. But it is our park facilities that truly set us apart ... you'll find a 25 metre resort style pool with 2 swimming lanes and 4 pebble beach areas, heated spa, playground, free in-house movies, recreation and movie room, giant jumping pillow and much much more.
